title: I’m a Martial Art Villainess but I’m the Strongest Novel - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Josei   Martial Arts   Romance   Wuxia
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Clumsy Love Interests   Cultivation   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in Another World   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Sudden Strength Gain   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Willbrite
description: Our main character was an unsuccessful romance fantasy novelist when she gets into a hit-and-run then wakes up as the villainess in a best-selling martial arts novel. She uses the information from the novel that she had analyzed in her original life, in order to avoid her death-ending and finding the truth behind what had really happened to her.>
